Entry.JapaneseText: はぁ〜〜〜食べた、食べた！ やっぱ、ジィちゃんの作る アクティブタの角煮は最高だなぁ
Entry.EnglishText: Mhhhh~ How tasty! As I thought, Gramp's stewed pork belly is really the best!

Entry.JapaneseText: だろ？ グミ焼酎をいれて煮こむのが 秘訣なんだぞ
Entry.EnglishText: See? The secret is to cook it in some liquer gel.
Entry.Notes: Maybe "That's right" for the first phrase

Entry.JapaneseText: ゼクスさん……となり街の 兄の娘が、もう何日も口もきかず 部屋からも出てこないらしい
Entry.EnglishText: Mr. Zeks... My brother says his daughter hasn't spoken or come out of her room for days now. They're in the next city over.

Entry.JapaneseText: 兄は、例の『デスピル病』じゃ ないかって心配してるんだ…… ソーマで診てはもらえんかねぇ？
Entry.EnglishText: He's worried that she might have contracted that disease called "Despir." Could you check up on her with your Soma?

Entry.JapaneseText: デスピル病！ 最近、流行って るんだってね。スピリアが 暴走する原因不明の奇病なんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Despir! It seems to be rampant these days. It's that strange disease which causes people's Spiria to go out of control, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: その上、普通の医者や薬では どうにもできないときている
Entry.EnglishText: On top of that, ordinary doctors and medicines can't do anything to treat it.

Entry.JapaneseText: う〜ん、『スピリア』ってのは 難しく言うと精神と意思を生み出す 『生命の根源』だからねぇ
Entry.EnglishText: Let's see, to put it simply, "Spiria" is the "root of life" that gives birth to our spirit and will.

Entry.JapaneseText: それを癒せるのは、人の スピリアの中に『リンク』できる 神秘の武具『ソーマ』だけさ！
Entry.EnglishText: Only Somas, which are a type of magical weapon, can "link" with a person's Spiria and heal them.

Entry.JapaneseText: お前はだまっとれ！ ……スマンが、ワシはソーマを 気軽に使う訳にはいかんのだ
Entry.EnglishText: Stay quiet you fool! ...Look, I'm sorry, but I can't just go using my Soma willy-nilly.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでさ？ いつも『人が困って たら助けろ。美人が困ってたら 絶対助けろ』って言ってるクセに
Entry.EnglishText: Why not? You always say to "help out someone in need." And "if it's a beautiful lady, then definitely help her out."

Entry.JapaneseText: 兄の娘は なかなかの美人ですが……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, she is quite the beauty...

Entry.JapaneseText: ほほう!? …………いやいや そういう問題ではなくて
Entry.EnglishText: Oh-ho!? ...Err, that's not the point here.

Entry.JapaneseText: この前は、村の広場で 突然暴れだした奴にリンクして すぐにおとなしくさせたじゃないか
Entry.EnglishText: But the other day, when that guy started acting up in the village square, you linked with him and got him to calm down.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもオレ、死んだ母さんが ソーマ使いだったとは聞いてたけど
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that my late mom was a Somatic...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジィちゃんもソーマが使えるなんて あの時まで知らなかったなぁ
Entry.EnglishText: but I didn’t know you could use it too up until then, Gramps.

Entry.JapaneseText: 明かす気はなかったが 暴れた男には『ゼロム』が 憑いておったからな……
Entry.EnglishText: I hadn't intended to reveal it, but the man who was acting up had been possessed by a "Xerom...."

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、『彼女』の身に何かが？ ソーマリンクの感触では、かなり 力が衰えているようだったが……
Entry.EnglishText: Could it be that something happened to "her?" From the Soma Link, it seems that her strength has diminished greatly...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……無理は言いたくないが 教会もないこんな辺境では ゼクスさんを頼るしかないんだよ
Entry.EnglishText: ...I don't want to impose on you, but in such a remote place that has no church, we have no choice but to rely on you Mr. Zeks.

Entry.JapaneseText: ジィちゃん 人のスピリアを救うのが ソーマ使いの役目じゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: Gramps, isn't it the duty of a Somatic to save people?

Entry.JapaneseText: 放ってもおけんか。 とにかく一度様子を診て ソーマを使うかどうか判断しよう
Entry.EnglishText: I suppose I can't just ignore this. In any case, let me first take a look at her and see if we need to use the Soma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがたい！ お願いします
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you so much!
That's what I'm talking about!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Shing> お前は連れていかんぞ。 となり街だからな
Entry.EnglishText: ...<Shing>, I'm not taking you with me. It's in the next city over.

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ、またかよ!? なんでジィちゃんはオレを村から 出してくれないんだよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Ehhh, again!? Why won't you ever let me leave the village!?

Entry.JapaneseText: オレは、もう子どもじゃないんだ！ 訳のわからない命令は いいかげんにしてくれッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not a child anymore! Why won't you ever explain it to me!
That's the reason.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Shing>、教えたはずだぞ。 怒りや憎しみ……強い感情に のみこまれてはいかん、と
Entry.EnglishText: <Shing>, I've told you countless times before. Don't let yourself be consumed by strong emotions such as anger and hate.
Ugh...

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな弱いスピリアじゃ、街の 美人に会ったら、一発でとろけて しまうからなぁ〜
Entry.EnglishText: If your Spiria is that weak, you'd melt at your first sight of a beautiful city girl~.
T-That's totally your problem!

Entry.JapaneseText: ははは、お前に色気はまだ早い！ 土産に『グミ大福』を買ってきて やるから、おとなしく待ってろ
Entry.EnglishText: Hahaha, you're not ready to handle that kind of sexiness yet! Look, I'll get you daifuku gels as a souvenir, so sit still and relax.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ！ 留守番なんか してたって、スピリアが 強くなるわけないだろ！
Entry.EnglishText: But why!? Staying at home won't make my Spiria any stronger!

Entry.JapaneseText: ゼクスさん！ ゼクスさん！ ねぇ、きみ、お祖父さんは どこなの？
Entry.EnglishText: Mr. Zeks! Mr. Zeks! Hey, you, where's your grandpa?

Entry.JapaneseText: ジィちゃんは出かけてるんだ。 夕方には帰るはずだよ
Entry.EnglishText: Gramps is out right now. He should be back in the evening.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……てめぇ、<Kohaku>を 家に連れこむために うそをついたんじゃねぇだろうな!?
Entry.EnglishText: ...You asshole, you lied to lure <Kohaku> into the house, didn't you!?

Entry.JapaneseText: うそじゃないよ！ よし、証拠のソーマを見せてやる！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not lying! Look, I'll show you the Soma as proof!

Entry.JapaneseText: これは…… ジィちゃんが書いた ソーマ使いの心得書だ
Entry.EnglishText: Let's see... It's a guide that Gramps wrote for Somatics.

Entry.JapaneseText: ジィちゃんめ……やっぱ カギかけてるな？ でもカギの 隠し場所なんてお見通しだぜ
Entry.EnglishText: Just as I thought, Gramps locked it away. But I know where he hid the key.

Entry.JapaneseText: ウチの妹に妙な真似しやがったら マジで殺すからな
Entry.EnglishText: If you try anything weird with my sister, I'mma kill you for real.

Entry.JapaneseText: カギは『グミ焼酎』の タルの裏……と、見せかけて こっちの『ぬか漬け』の中だ！
Entry.EnglishText: The key is behind the gel shochu... or so he pretended to place it, but it's actually hidden under the nukazuke!
Entry.Notes: Is there an english equivalent to use for shochu and nukazuke?

Entry.EnglishText: Got it♪
Okay, it's open!
So this is... a Soma...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうさ！ 思念術を操り人間のスピリアに リンクできる神秘の武具なんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yup! It's a magical weapon that can manipulate the power of Will and link to human Spirias!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここには、もうひとつ ソーマがあるはずなんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: There should be another Soma around here...

Entry.JapaneseText: うん。 岬に別のソーマを奉った ほこらがあるけど？
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah. It's at that shrine of the nearby cape though.
Entry.Notes: Is it a shrine or grave?

Entry.JapaneseText: そこだ！ 今すぐ俺たちを そこに連れて行きやがれ!!
Entry.EnglishText: That's the place! Hurry up and take us there right now!

Entry.JapaneseText: 失礼でしょ、お兄ちゃん！ ……あの、えっと
Entry.EnglishText: You're being rude, <Hisui>! ...Umm, you're...
...It's <Shing>. <Shing> Meteoryte.
Got it, <Shing>. I'm <Kohaku> Hearts.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……と、こっちは兄の <Hisui>＝ハーツです。 疑ってごめんなさい
Entry.EnglishText: ...And over there is my brother, <Hisui> Hearts. Sorry we were suspicious of you earlier.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、わたしたちは、どうしても ソーマの力が必要なの。ほこら まで案内してもらえませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: But we really need that Soma. Could you lead us to that shrine?

Entry.JapaneseText: オレが変な事しようと してたんじゃないって 信じてくれるなら……いいよ
Entry.EnglishText: Just as long as you trust I wasn't doing any funny... it should be fine.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、信じるよ。 変な人にソーマを 使えるはずないもんね
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I trust you. There's no way some pervert could use a Soma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いや、実際に使うのは 初めてなんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Err, this is actually my first time using it...
Huh!?

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんでもないよ！ 最近は、この辺も魔物が増えて ぶっそうなんだ
Entry.EnglishText: I-It's nothing! More importantly, there's a lot more monsters around here these days.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……だから、まずは ソーマの解放をしなくちゃ
Entry.EnglishText: ...And so the first thing I have to do is release the Soma.

Entry.JapaneseText: よし、これで魔物と戦える。 さぁ、行こう！ ソーマのほこらは岬にあるんだ
Entry.EnglishText: There, that should let me fight the monsters. Come on, let's go! The shrine is at the cape.

Entry.JapaneseText: ジィちゃん！ ジィちゃん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Gramps! Gramps!
Outta the way!
<Hisui>... you can use healing artes?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ。 だが、この傷は 俺程度の回復術じゃあ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah. But for wounds this bad, my skills aren't enough...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレのせいだ……オレじゃなく ジィちゃんがソーマをつけてれば こんな事にはならなかったのに！
Entry.EnglishText: It's all my fault... If only Gramps had been using the Soma and not me, none of this would've happened!
Uhh... Ughhhh!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああッ…… <Kohaku>にも回復術を かけてあげてよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Ah... Use your healing artes on <Kohaku> too!

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、<Kohaku>に外傷はねぇ。 あの野郎、<Kohaku>の スピリアに術をかけやがったんだ
Entry.EnglishText: It won't work, <Kohaku>'s injuries aren't physical. That asshole used some sort of arte on her Spiria.

Entry.JapaneseText: スピリアが蝕まれたら 回復術じゃどうしようもない……
Entry.EnglishText: If it's her Spiria that's damaged then healing artes won't do squat...
Ha... Ha... Ugh!

Entry.JapaneseText: …………オレがやる。オレが <Kohaku>のスピリアに ソーマでリンクして術を解く！
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'll do it then. I'll link to <Kohaku>'s Spiria using the Soma to break the arte.

Entry.JapaneseText: 待て、待て、待てッ！ 手引書見てるよーな奴に できんのかよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Hold your horses! There's no way you'll succeed if you're still on training wheels with the damn manual!?

Entry.JapaneseText: できなくてもやるんだ！ ジィちゃんの代わりに!!
Entry.EnglishText: Even if I don't know how, I just gotta do it. In Gramps' place!
Ahh.. Ahhhh!
Damn it, this really is the worst!
Alright, I'm going in!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、てめぇ！ 何を しやがった!? <Kohaku>は 大丈夫なんだろうな？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you! What the hell did you do!? Is <Kohaku> gonna be okay?
Big... bro...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Kohaku>ッ！ よかった………… 兄ちゃん、心配したんだぞ？
Entry.EnglishText: <Kohaku>! Thank goodnes... Boy, you had us worried there, didn'tcha?
...Goodness... ...Worr...ied...

Entry.JapaneseText: …………やめろよ、<Kohaku>。 ふざけてっと怒るぞ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Stop messing around <Kohaku>. I'mma get angry if you're playing around.
...What is that?

Entry.JapaneseText: おい……もう一回聞くぞ。 お前、<Kohaku>に 何をしてくれた？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey... I'mma ask you one more time. What the hell did you do to <Kohaku>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ごめん、オレ………… <Kohaku>のスピルーンを …………バラバラにしちゃった
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry, I... <Kohaku>'s Spirune... I ended up breaking it.
...Her Spirune?

Entry.JapaneseText: スピリアの……核で…… 人の感情を生み出す源……です
Entry.EnglishText: It's... the core of the Spiria... and the source of human emotions...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……それをぶっ壊してくれ たってか？ つまり<Kohaku>は もう二度と笑う事も……
Entry.EnglishText: ...And you destroyed it? Then, <Kohaku> will never laugh again...
She'll never get angry...

Entry.JapaneseText: …………悲しむ事すら ねぇって事かぁぁーーーッ！！！
Entry.EnglishText: ...She'll never feel sad ever again!!!
<Hisui>... Stop... it...

Entry.JapaneseText: スピルーンが……まだ残ってる!?
Entry.EnglishText: She still... has a part of her Spirune!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Kohaku>は ケンカや弱いものイジメが 大嫌いなんだ
Entry.EnglishText: ...<Kohaku> would always hate fighting and bullying.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺がケンカする度に いつも怒ってとめに来たっけ。 怒り方は忘れても……
Entry.EnglishText: Everytime I got into a fight, she'd always get angry at me and stopped me. She may have forgotten her anger, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: この『優しさ』だけは 消えてねぇんだな
Entry.EnglishText: She still has her "kindness."

Entry.JapaneseText: うぅッ……そうだ。 まだ、その娘のスピルーンは 失われてはいない……
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh... Indeed. That girl's Spirune has not been lost yet...

Entry.JapaneseText: 飛び散った欠片を全て 集めれば……元のスピリアを 取り戻せるはず……だ
Entry.EnglishText: If you can gather all the scatter pieces... you should be able her Spiria... to the way it was.
R-Really!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、きっとソーマの力が 導いてくれる…………ぐふッ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, I'm sure your Soma will show the way... Guh...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああッ！ <Hisui>、お願いだ!! ジィちゃんに回復術を……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Ahhh! <Hisui>, please! Use your healing artes on Gramps...

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、その青年は 十分やって……くれたよ。 ワシがもう無駄だと……言ったのだ
Entry.EnglishText: No, this boy… did all he could. I told him it’s… no use.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな……やだよ、ジィちゃん！ オレ、どんな命令でも守るから ……だから…………
Entry.EnglishText: No... I can't accept that, Gramps! Come on, I'll do anything you say... so please...
...Don't die!!!

Entry.JapaneseText: こら……<Shing>。 また激しい感情に…… のみこまれておるぞ？
Entry.EnglishText: Come on... <Shing>. You're letting... those emotions of yours get the better of you again?

Entry.JapaneseText: 感情に流されない…… 強いスピリアを育てるんだ
Entry.EnglishText: Don’t let your emotions get the better of you... and raise a strong Spiria…

Entry.JapaneseText: これは『命令』じゃない…… ジィちゃんとの……『約束』だ
Entry.EnglishText: This isn't an "order..." It's a promise... with this old man.
O-Okay! It's a "promise"!

Entry.JapaneseText: いい子だ。信じて……いるぞ…… お前の真っ直ぐなスピリア……は ……に……ないと…………
Entry.EnglishText: Good boy. I believe… in you… You must make your Spiria… Strong... and firm...
Gra...mps...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジィちゃぁーーーーーんッッ！！！
Entry.EnglishText: Grampssssss!!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 人のスピリアは 『スピルメイズ』と呼ばれる ダンジョンを形作っています
ソーマは、スピルメイズに 入りこむ<Red>『スピルリンク』<Normal>能力を 備えています
<Red>スピルリンク<Normal>可能な人は 条件を満たすと 特定のマークが表示され……
マークが表示されている 状態で話しかけると <Red>スピルリンク<Normal>する事ができます
しくじるんじゃねえぞ
……スピリア……を…… 強く……持つんだ…………
